public class SpectrometerController

      • getSpectrometerData

        @RequestMapping(value="/GetSpectrometerData",
                method=POST)
 @ResponseBody
public java.util.List<java.util.List<java.util.List<java.lang.Double>>> getSpectrometerData(@RequestParam(value="intTime")
                                                                                                                                                                                         java.lang.Double integrationTime,
                                                                                                                                                                                         @RequestParam(value="laserPower")
                                                                                                                                                                                         java.lang.Double laserPower,
                                                                                                                                                                                         @RequestParam(value="s2a")
                                                                                                                                                                                         java.lang.Integer s2a,
                                                                                                                                                                                         @RequestParam(value="boxcar")
                                                                                                                                                                                         java.lang.Integer boxcar,
                                                                                                                                                                                         @RequestParam(value="electricDark")
                                                                                                                                                                                         java.lang.Integer electricDark,
                                                                                                                                                                                         @RequestParam(value="nonLinear")
                                                                                                                                                                                         java.lang.Integer nonLinear,
                                                                                                                                                                                         @RequestParam(value="delay")
                                                                                                                                                                                         java.lang.Double delay,
                                                                                                                                                                                         @RequestParam(value="repeats")
                                                                                                                                                                                         java.lang.Integer repeats,
                                                                                                                                                                                         @RequestParam(value="steps[][]")
                                                                                                                                                                                         java.lang.String[][] steps)
                                                                                                                                                                                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Get Spectrometer Acquisition Data for the specified parameters and apply the Signal Processing (if and what selected)
        Parameters:
        integrationTime - Integration Time for Spectrometer Acquisition
        laserPower - Laser Power
        s2a - Scans to Average
        boxcar - BoxCar Width
        electricDark - Electric Dark Flag
        nonLinear - Non Linear Flag
        delay - Delay duration
        repeats - Number of repeats
        steps - Signal Processing Steps
        Returns:
        Signal processed data collected from Spectrometer
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
